typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Enrollment_Contract_ID as string,
		Contract_Number as string,
		Contract_Desc as string,
		Contract_Category_Code as string,
		Line_Of_Business_Category_Code as string,
		Line_Of_Business_Sub_Category_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Line_Of_Business_Category_Code = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		Line_Of_Business_Sub_Category_Code = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
